content.description: Start on the low shelf jug then move up to a cool vertical pinch, the crux for most will be launching to a crimp out right which will help you gain the lip, topout left of the little tree using the textured slopers. If the throw to the crimp is easy the topout might be scrunchy.Set your out of office messages on and come give this little guy a rip!
content.protection: Pad or two ought to do, landing drops off a bit for the topout.
content.location: the obvious line dead center of the work remotely boulder.Â

content.description: Shady, pretty block with some quartz intrusions and a little tree sticking out the lip. A bit short but has one worthwhile climb.
